Help and Documentation ​

Welcome to the Glyphr Studio v2 docs ​

Glyphr Studio v2 is out now! On January 15th, 2024, Glyphr Studio all-up will switch from v1 to v2 being the default experience. If you have any questions or feedback, please send us an email! mail@glyphrstudio.com

More detail on the blog ​

These blog posts has a ton of information about the road to v2.0.0, and beyond:

  • Glyphr Studio Blog: Version 2 is here!
  • V1 to V2 transition plan
